alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:37AM EST until February 07 at 6:20AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 07... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, February 07. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 33.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, February 06. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. &&
